summary: In 1950s Canada, during a commercial flight, the pilots and some passengers suffer food poisoning, thus forcing an ex-WW2 fighter pilot to try to land the airliner in heavy fog.
cast: Dana Andrews|Linda Darnell|Sterling Hayden|Elroy 'Crazylegs' Hirsch|Geoffrey Toone|Jerry Paris|Peggy King|Patricia Tiernan|Charles Quinlivan|Steve London|Jo Ann Wade|Ray Ferrell|John Ashley|Willis Bouchey|Maxine Cooper|David Thursby|Noel Drayton|Fintan Meyler|Larry Thor|Russell Thorson|Robert Stevenson|Mary Newton|Will Sage|Hope Summers|Will J. White|Richard Keith|Arthur Hanson|Roy Gordon|Billy Regis Band|Woody Chambliss|William Conrad|Fred Fisher|Rudy Germane|James Gonzalez|Herschel Graham|Duane Grey|S. John Launer|James Maloney|William H. O'Brien|Monty O'Grady|Billy Regis|Katherine Warren|John Zaremba
title: Suspense... hora cero
